What are the symptoms of Abdominal Adhesions ?,"In most cases, abdominal adhesions do not cause symptoms. When symptoms are present, chronic abdominal pain is the most common.",NIDDK,Abdominal Adhesions
What are the complications of Abdominal Adhesions ?,"Abdominal adhesions can cause intestinal obstruction and female infertilitythe inability to become pregnant after a year of trying.
